Title: Pak Pak Pakaak
Writer: Gautam Joglekar (story and screenplay), Sanjay Mone (dialogue)
Actors: Nana Patekar, Saksham Kulkarni, Narayani Shastri, Usha Nadkarni
Plot: A mischievous boy, living with his grandmother in a village that people believe is haunted, meets the ghost "Bhutya". How the "Bhutya" transforms the boy's character and the whole village in the process, forms the rest of the story.
